channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NH
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NH

item.title: Report E-2024050024
item.description:
Report E-2024050024

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-06T15:11:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-24
  • City: MANCHESTER
  • State: NH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS SHARED SERVICES, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On April 24, 2024, one (1) 4-liter glass bottle of UN1593 fell in transit and released approximately one (1) gallon of product to the trailer interior. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Green Site Services Group (GSSG) to remediate the impacted site. GSSG personnel deployed granular absorbents and pads to the impacted trailer and swept them in with hand tools. All spent absorbents and the damaged container were placed into one (1) 55-gallon drum to be staged onsite for future disposal.
